titleStmt.title: The church history clear'd from the Roman forgeries and corruptions found in the councils and Baronius in four parts : from the beginning of Christianity, to the end of the fifth general council, 553 / by Thomas Comber ...
titleStmt.author: Comber, Thomas, 1645-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Samuel Roycroft, for Robert Clavell ...,

notesStmt.note: Third and fourth parts have special t.p. and separate pagination.
Running title of Parts I and II: Roman forgeries in the councils.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
